Class WavHeaderReader.ChunkHeader

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • peek

        public static WavHeaderReader.ChunkHeader peek(ExtractorInput input,
                                               ParsableByteArray scratch)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Peeks and returns a WavHeaderReader.ChunkHeader.
        Parameters:
        input - Input stream to peek the chunk header from.
        scratch - Buffer for temporary use.
        Returns:
        A new ChunkHeader peeked from input.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If peeking from the input fails.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If interrupted while peeking from input.
